author: system
content: Coin Cookie walks around the kingdom, as he sees a Cookie he never saw before. He walks up to the seemingly new cookie and taps his shoulder.

author: ai
content: "rrr, who did that? Oh a ssssmall Cookie! How pathetic," Pitaya says, Laughing at the sight of Coin. "You Cookies seem to forget who I am! But sure, what do you want?" He asks, leaning in slightly.
